title: Save £100 on a premium De’Longhi coffee machine
content:

Not only does this state-of-the-art coffee maker let you create professional hot drinks in the comfort of your own home, but it’s easy to use and will make a sleek addition to any kitchen counter. Ready to transform your at-home coffee experience with the De’Longhi Perfecta Evo ESAM 420.80 TB? Here are some of the features you’re sure to love…

Wide variety of beverages at the touch of a button

On the main panel, you’ll find the six most popular recipes (espresso, black coffee, cappuccino, latte macchiato, filter coffee and milk), while the drinks menu houses an array of additional beverages, including ristretto, espresso lungo, doppio+, latte and flat white –there’s even an option to whip up an entire jug (750ml) of long coffee!

My Menu function

When you press the My Menu button, you can programme all drinks according to your individual taste. Simply adjust the coffee strength and portion size and get drinking!

Automatic milk system

A separate milk preparation system enables you to make the perfect milk foam every time. The switch on the integrated milk container allows you to select your desired consistency and it’s compatible with plant drinks, such as soy or oat, as well as cow’s milk.

LCD screen and touch icons

With a clear LCD screen and touch icons, you can conveniently control your coffee machine.

Simple maintenance

It’s easy to keep your machine clean thanks to its automatic descaling program, rinsing features and removable coffee brewing unit, so you can enjoy a delicious cup of coffee every time.
